flavorText:
"Patient complained of burning sensation in upper back and at base of neck. Bed rest recommended. In a couple days, he should feel like a new man."
—Lagra, hamlet physician

foreignData.flavorText:
„Der Patient klagt über ein Brennen im Bereich der Schultern und des Nackens. Habe Bettruhe angeordnet. In ein paar Tagen sollte er sich wie neu geboren fühlen."
—Lagra, Mediziner aus dem Weiler
foreignData.name: Monströse Hautirritation // Monströser Dermasit

foreignData.flavorText:
"El paciente refiere una sensación ardiente en la parte superior de la espalda y en la base del cuello. Se le recomendó reposo. En un par de días debería producirse su plena recuperación."
—Lagra, galena de aldea
foreignData.name: Invasión dérmica // Mudapiel

foreignData.flavorText:
« Le patient se plaignait d'une sensation de brûlure à la base de la nuque. Je lui ai recommandé de garder le lit. Dans quelques jours, il n'y paraîtra plus. »
—Lagra, doctoresse du hameau
foreignData.name: Invasion cutanée // Délesteur de peau

foreignData.flavorText:
"Il paziente lamenta una sensazione di bruciore nella parte superiore del dorso e alla base del collo. Si consiglia riposo a letto. In un paio di giorni, dovrebbe tornare come nuovo."
—Lagra, medico del villaggio
foreignData.name: Invasione Cutanea // Mutascorza

foreignData.faceName: 皮膚から抜け出たもの
foreignData.flavorText:
「患者は上背部から首の付け根にかけて焼けるような痛みを訴えた。安静を勧めた。数日後には、患者は生まれ変わったような気分になるだろう。」
――小村の医師、ラグラ
foreignData.name: 皮膚への侵入 // 皮膚から抜け出たもの
foreignData.type: クリーチャー ― - 昆虫・ホラー

foreignData.flavorText:
"환자는 등 위쪽과 목 아래에서 타는 듯한 고통을 호소했다. 침상 휴식을 권했다. 며칠 뒤면 다시 태어난 것 같이 느끼겠지."
—시골 마을 의사 라그라
foreignData.name: 피부 침투 // 껍질 탈피자

foreignData.flavorText:
"O paciente queixou-se de sensação de ardor no alto das costas e na base do pescoço. Foi recomendado repouso. Em alguns dias ele deve se sentir um novo homem."
— Lagra, médica de aldeia
foreignData.name: Invasão da Pele // Troca-peles

foreignData.flavorText:
«Пациент жалуется на жжение в верхней части спины и у основания шеи. Рекомендован постельный режим. Через пару дней он будет как новенький».
— Лагра, деревенская врачевательница
foreignData.name: Проникновение под Кожу // Вылинявший

foreignData.flavorText:
「病人自诉后背上方靠近颈部的地方有灼烧感。建议卧床休息。过几天应该就能感到焕然新生。」
～村庄大夫兰葛
foreignData.name: 皮肤入侵 // 蜕皮妖

foreignData.flavorText:
「病人自訴後背上方靠近頸部的地方有灼燒感。建議臥床休息。過幾天應該就能感到煥然新生。」
～村莊大夫蘭葛
foreignData.name: 皮膚入侵 // 蛻皮妖

name: Skin Invasion // Skin Shedder

rulings.text: The controller of Skin Invasion, not the controller of the enchanted creature, returns Skin Invasion to the battlefield transformed.
The enchanted creature’s controller still chooses which player or planeswalker that creature attacks.

If, during your declare attackers step, the enchanted creature is tapped or is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, then it doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having that creature attack, its controller isn’t forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t have to attack in that case either.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).
